post.title: Day 06 - Wednesday, Januray 06, 2021
post.content:
Time management was becoming a mess for me as I was trying to work on this blog and was also trying to learn and to some of the Java Android Projects to better understand what I was learning. But in swithcing from learning to doing and to giving time to blog and also working overtime than my usual at the office, I was not reaching anywhere and searched a little on the web to sovle this problem first and found this video by TED about time management. What was interesting in this video was how programmers of Linux solved the time management problem by adding a system of priority buckets. This let the Linux OS to prioritize fixed no of tasks at a time to max its productivity and from this I thought of halting my Java Android Learning for a time and give all the time developing this blog.

What I Learned Today

💻 Programming

  • Next.js - Server Side Rendering with React. While looking through YouTube I found this video by FireShip and was uploaded recently so I watched it because before working with Gatsby I was comparing both Next and gatsby to look for what will better for a blog and I chosed Gatsby because I can deploy it on GitHub or Netlify unlike Nextjs for which I had to have a Backend server which would require a little more time to maintain.

🗾 Langauge[日本語]

  • 鉛筆 (えんぴつ) Pencil. Don't remember first one and second means Brush.
  • 病院 (びょういん) Hospital. The first kanji is for Sick or Ill and I don't remember what second kanji means.
  • 電気屋 (でんきや) Electrician. The first two kanji means Electricity and the third one means roof I think.
  • 看護師 (かんごし) Nurse. First kanji I think counter for clothes, Second for Sagegaurd and third for Expert.
  • お大事 (おだいじ) Take Care. Second kanji is for Big and third one is for Matter.
  • 調子 (ちょうし) Condition. First kanji for Week and Second for Child.
